mapper.select: SELECT exp.user_id, cate.kind, cate.category, exp.expense_date as expenseDate, exp.amount FROM tb_expense exp JOIN tb_category cate ON exp.category_id = cate.category_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND exp.expense_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_expense (user_id, category_id, expense_date, amount) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{expenseDate}, #{amount})
